attributes.action: Ban Fox Hunting, Or any Animal Hunting, Do something about it.
attributes.additional_details: There’s evidence that they are leading these. They never try stop the dogs, there’s people telling them to stop it but yet the people get off the horses and whip the people trying to stop it all from occurring. So it’s obviously not a trail, it’s obviously deliberate, they are killing wild animals for no reason, claiming that they all need to be extinct so we can save chickens, why don’t people just put their chickens somewhere safe?, it’s nature animals kill for food, we would do the same.
attributes.background: Well as most the public know there are many people killing animals, and 3/4 of the public will agree that it should be stopped. They chase a small animal around a field until it’s tired and collapses so it get ripped to pieces by 12 dogs and they claim it’s a trail and it was an accident🤦🏼‍.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like all hunting banned or only fox hunting. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
